description: Track power outages affecting the Half Moon Bay area with this interactive map displaying real-time PG&E outage data within a 15-mile radius. The application visualizes outage locations as point markers and affected areas as polygons, while displaying key statistics including the number of outages, impacted customers, and affected regions. Custom markers can be added by providing a URL parameter, and the map automatically refreshes every five minutes to ensure current outage information.
